Of the 6765 Canadians who have died from COVID-19, I've linked 5841 to residential care. That's 86.3%. There are about 10 deaths missing from this list that are confirmed LTC.   Good news -- no new worker deaths for a few days now.   https://t.co/rtxyvfFyff

What LTC does NOT need is less PSWs. More nurses yes, less PSWs, no. PSWs have an important role, and in some cases love their residents like family. They compassionately have continued to provide care and some have died for it. They have my complete gratitude for that.
